scripts.start: concurrently "cd dsl; pnpm start" "cd home; pnpm start" "cd nav; pnpm start" "cd search; pnpm start" "cd utils; pnpm start"
scripts.stackblitzStart: cd dsl; pnpm build && cd ../home; pnpm build && cd ../nav; pnpm build && cd ../search; pnpm build && cd ../utils; pnpm build && pnpm serve
scripts.build: concurrently "cd dsl; pnpm build" "cd home; pnpm build" "cd nav; pnpm build" "cd search; pnpm build" "cd utils; pnpm build"
scripts.serve: concurrently "pnpm serve:dsl" "pnpm serve:home" "pnpm serve:nav" "pnpm serve:search" "pnpm serve:utils"
